price: 85. Yallak meesita mara (moominiin kinnuk) kobxisna ayroy Racmaan kinni Rabbí fanah irgay feereynaanih amot tanih ken bahna konnaba luk.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
